snippet: An appeal from the public media company PRX to fund its podcast network Radiotopia comes as new attention is being focused on podcasts.
abstract: Kickstarter campaign by public media company PRX raises $620,412 to fund its podcast network Radiotopia.
lead_paragraph: An appeal from the public media company PRX to fund its podcast network Radiotopia comes as new attention is being focused on podcasts.

headline.main: Kickstarter Campaign Focuses on Public Radio
headline.print_headline: Kickstarter Campaign Focuses on Public Radio
